nodes.text: The Skills boost D-package significantly modified brain chemistry in order to improve general problem solving and data processing abilities. It allowed for a vast increase in the performance quality of skill-related tasks, making it the most valuable implant of its type. The technology of D-package implants had the consequence of rendering them larger and more intrusive than other types. Thus, they tended to have more impressive effects, but could only be used by very healthy individuals.
In the game, the playable character must have a constitution attribute of 18 or higher.
